   22: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   23: %% Purpose:
   24: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   25: -module(megaco_udp_SUITE).
   26: 
   27: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   28: %% Include files
   29: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   30: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   31: -include_lib("megaco/src/udp/megaco_udp.hrl").
   32: -include("megaco_test_lib.hrl").
   33: 
   34: 
   35: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   36: %% External exports
   37: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   38: -export([
   39: 	 suite/0, all/0, groups/0,
   40:          init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   41:          init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
   42:          init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2,
   43: 
   44: 	 start_normal/1,
   45: 	 start_invalid_opt/1,
   46:          start_and_stop/1,
   47: 	 sendreceive/1,
   48:          block_unblock/1,
   49: 	 socket_failure/1
   50: 
   51:          ]).
   52: 
   53: 
   54: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   55: %% Internal exports
   56: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   57: -export([
   58: 	 receive_message/4,
   59: 	 process_received_message/4
   60:         ]).
   61: 
   62: 
   63: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   64: %% Macros
   65: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   66: 
   67: -define(CH,             megaco_test_command_handler).
   68: -define(TEST_VERBOSITY, debug).
   69: 
   70: 
   71: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   72: %% Records
   73: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   74: 
   75: 
   76: %%======================================================================
   77: %% Common Test interface functions
   78: %%======================================================================
   79: 
   80: suite() -> 
   81:     [{ct_hooks, [ts_install_cth]}].
   82: 
   83: all() -> 
   84:     %% This is a temporary messure to ensure that we can 
   85:     %% test the socket backend without effecting *all*
   86:     %% applications on *all* machines.
   87:     %% This flag is set only for *one* host.
   88:     case ?TEST_INET_BACKENDS() of
   89:         true ->
   90:             [
   91:              {group, inet_backend_default},
   92:              {group, inet_backend_inet},
   93:              {group, inet_backend_socket}
   94:             ];
   95:         _ ->
   96:             [
   97:              {group, inet_backend_default}
   98:             ]
   99:     end.
  100: 
  101: groups() -> 
  102:     [
  103:      {inet_backend_default,          [], inet_backend_default_cases()},
  104:      {inet_backend_inet,             [], inet_backend_inet_cases()},
  105:      {inet_backend_socket,           [], inet_backend_socket_cases()},
  106: 
  107:      {all,                           [], all_cases()},
  108:      {start,                         [], start_cases()},
  109:      {sending,                       [], sending_cases()},
  110:      {error,                         [], error_cases()}
  111:     ].
  112: 
  113: inet_backend_default_cases() ->
  114:     [{all, [], all_cases()}].
  115: 
  116: inet_backend_inet_cases() ->
  117:     [{all, [], all_cases()}].
  118: 
  119: inet_backend_socket_cases() ->
  120:     [{all, [], all_cases()}].
  121: 
  122: all_cases() -> 
  123:     [
  124:      {group, start},
  125:      {group, sending},
  126:      {group, error}
  127:     ].
  128: 
  129: start_cases() ->
  130:     [
  131:      start_normal,
  132:      start_invalid_opt,
  133:      start_and_stop
  134:     ].
  135: 
  136: sending_cases() ->
  137:     [
  138:      sendreceive,
  139:      block_unblock
  140:     ].
  141: 
  142: error_cases() ->
  143:     [
  144:      socket_failure
  145:     ].
  146: 
  147: 
  148: 
  149: %%
  150: %% -----
  151: %%
  152: 
  153: init_per_suite(suite) ->
  154:     [];
  155: init_per_suite(doc) ->
  156:     [];
  157: init_per_suite(Config0) when is_list(Config0) ->
  158: 
  159:     ?ANNOUNCE_SUITE_INIT(),
  160: 
  161:     p("init_per_suite -> entry with"
  162:       "~n      Config: ~p"
  163:       "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config0, erlang:nodes()]),
  164: 
  165:     case ?LIB:init_per_suite(Config0) of
  166:         {skip, _} = SKIP ->
  167:             SKIP;
  168: 
  169:         Config1 when is_list(Config1) ->
  170: 
  171:             %% We need a (local) monitor on this node also
  172:             megaco_test_sys_monitor:start(),
  173: 
  174:             p("init_per_suite -> end when"
  175:               "~n      Config: ~p"
  176:               "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config1, erlang:nodes()]),
  177: 
  178:             Config1
  179:     end.
  180: 
  181: end_per_suite(suite) -> [];
  182: end_per_suite(doc) -> [];
  183: end_per_suite(Config0) when is_list(Config0) ->
  184: 
  185:     p("end_per_suite -> entry with"
  186:       "~n      Config: ~p"
  187:       "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config0, erlang:nodes()]),
  188: 
  189:     megaco_test_sys_monitor:stop(),
  190:     Config1 = ?LIB:end_per_suite(Config0),
  191: 
  192:     p("end_per_suite -> end when"
  193:       "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [erlang:nodes()]),
  194: 
  195:     Config1.
  196: 
  197: 
  198: %%
  199: %% -----
  200: %%
  201: 
  202: init_per_group(inet_backend_default = Group, Config) ->
  203:     ?ANNOUNCE_GROUP_INIT(Group),
  204:     [{socket_create_opts, []} | Config];
  205: init_per_group(inet_backend_inet = Group, Config) ->
  206:     ?ANNOUNCE_GROUP_INIT(Group),
  207:     case ?EXPLICIT_INET_BACKEND() of
  208:         true ->
  209:             %% The environment trumps us,
  210:             %% so only the default group should be run!
  211:             {skip, "explicit inet backend"};
  212:         false ->
  213:             [{socket_create_opts, [{inet_backend, inet}]} | Config]
  214:     end;
  215: init_per_group(inet_backend_socket = Group, Config) ->
  216:     ?ANNOUNCE_GROUP_INIT(Group),
  217:     case ?EXPLICIT_INET_BACKEND() of
  218:         true ->
  219:             %% The environment trumps us,
  220:             %% so only the default group should be run!
  221:             {skip, "explicit inet backend"};
  222:         false ->
  223:             [{socket_create_opts, [{inet_backend, socket}]} | Config]
  224:     end;
  225: init_per_group(Group, Config) ->
  226:     ?ANNOUNCE_GROUP_INIT(Group),
  227:     Config.
  228: 
  229: end_per_group(_Group, Config) ->
  230:     Config.
  231: 
  232: 
  233: 
  234: %%
  235: %% -----
  236: %%
  237: 
  238: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
  239: 
  240:     p("init_per_testcase -> entry with"
  241:       "~n   Config: ~p"
  242:       "~n   Nodes:  ~p", [Config, erlang:nodes()]),
  243:     
  244:     megaco_test_global_sys_monitor:reset_events(),
  245: 
  246:     megaco_test_lib:init_per_testcase(Case, Config).
  247: 
  248: end_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
  249: 
  250:     p("end_per_testcase -> entry with"
  251:       "~n   Config: ~p"
  252:       "~n   Nodes:  ~p", [Config, erlang:nodes()]),
  253: 
  254:     p("system events during test: "
  255:       "~n   ~p", [megaco_test_global_sys_monitor:events()]),
  256: 
  257:     megaco_test_lib:end_per_testcase(Case, Config).
  258: 
  259: 
  260: 
  261: %% =================================================
  262: %%
  263: %% ------------------ start ------------------------
  264: %% 
  265: %% =================================================
  266: 
  267: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  268: 
  269: start_normal(suite) ->
  270:     [];
  271: start_normal(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  272:     ?ACQUIRE_NODES(1, Config),
  273:     Opts = [{port, 0}, {receive_handle, apa}],
  274:     {ok, Pid} = start_case(Config, Opts, ok),
  275:     megaco_udp:stop_transport(Pid),
  276:     ok.
  277: 
  278: 
  279: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  280: 
  281: start_invalid_opt(suite) ->
  282:     [];
  283: start_invalid_opt(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  284:     ?ACQUIRE_NODES(1, Config),
  285:     Opts = [{port, 0}, {receivehandle, apa}],
  286:     start_case(Config, Opts, error).
  287: 
  288: 
  289: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  290: 
  291: start_and_stop(suite) ->
  292:     [];
  293: start_and_stop(doc) ->
  294:     ["This test case sets up a connection and then cloises it. "
  295:      "No data is sent. "];
  296: start_and_stop(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  297:     Factor = ?config(megaco_factor, Config),
  298:     ct:timetrap(Factor * ?SECS(45)),
  299:     Pre = fun() ->
  300: 		  p("create nodes"),
  301: 		  ServerNode = make_node_name(server),
  302: 		  ClientNode = make_node_name(client),
  303: 		  Nodes = [ServerNode, ClientNode],
  304: 		  ok = ?START_NODES(Nodes),
  305: 		  Nodes
  306: 	  end,
  307:     Case = fun(X) -> do_start_and_stop(Config, Factor, X) end,
  308:     Post = fun(Nodes) ->
  309:                    p("stop nodes"),
  310:                    ?STOP_NODES(lists:reverse(Nodes))
  311:            end,
  312:     try_tc(start_and_stop, Pre, Case, Post).
  313: 
  314: do_start_and_stop(Config, Factor, [ServerNode, ClientNode]) ->
  315:     %% Create command sequences
  316:     TOCalc = fun(BaseTO) -> to_calc(Factor, BaseTO) end,
  317:     TO     = TOCalc(?SECS(5)),
  318:     p("create command sequences"),
  319:     ServerPort = 2944,
  320:     ServerCmds = start_and_stop_server_commands(Config, ServerPort),
  321:     {ok, ServerHost} = inet:gethostname(),
  322:     ClientCmds = start_and_stop_client_commands(Config, TO, ServerPort, ServerHost),
  323: 
  324:     %% Start the test procs used in the test-case, one for each node
  325:     p("start command handlers"),
  326:     Server = server_start_command_handler(ServerNode, ServerCmds),
  327:     p("server command handler started: ~p", [Server]),
  328:     Client = client_start_command_handler(ClientNode, ClientCmds),
  329:     p("client command handler started: ~p", [Client]),
  330:     
  331:     ok     =
  332:         receive
  333:             {operational, Server} ->
  334:                 p("received listening message from server [~p] => "
  335:                   "send continue to client [~p]~n", [Server, Client]),
  336:                 Client ! {continue, self()},
  337:                 ok;
  338: 	    {'EXIT', Server, {skip, Reason}} ->
  339: 		?SKIP(Reason);
  340: 	    {'EXIT', Client, {skip, Reason}} ->
  341: 		?SKIP(Reason)
  342:         after TO ->
  343:                 {error, server_timeout}
  344:         end,
  345: 
  346:     ok = await_command_handler_completion([Server, Client], TOCalc(?SECS(20))),
  347:     p("done"),
  348:     ok.
  349: 
  350: 
  351: start_and_stop_server_commands(Config, Port) ->
  352:     Opts = [{port, Port}],
  353:     Self = self(),
  354:     [
  355:      #{id   => 1,
  356:        desc => "Command sequence init",
  357:        cmd  => fun(State) ->
  358: 		       {ok, State#{parent => Self}}
  359: 	       end},
  360: 
  361:      #{id   => 2,
  362:        desc => "Start transport",
  363:        cmd  => fun(State) ->
  364: 		       server_start_transport(State)
  365: 	       end},
  366: 
  367:      #{id   => 3,
  368:        desc => "Open",
  369:        cmd  => fun(State) ->
  370:                        server_open(Config, State, Opts)
  371: 	      end},
  372: 
  373:      #{id   => 4,
  374:        desc => "Notify operational",
  375:        cmd  => fun(State) ->
  376: 		      server_notify_operational(State)
  377: 	      end},
  378:      
  379:      #{id   => 5,
  380:        desc => "Await nothing",
  381:        cmd  => fun(State) ->
  382: 		      server_await_nothing(State, 5000)
  383: 	      end},
  384:      
  385:      #{id   => 6,
  386:        desc => "Close",
  387:        cmd  => fun(State) ->
  388: 		      server_close(State)
  389: 	      end},
  390:      
  391:      #{id   => 7,
  392:        desc => "Stop",
  393:        cmd  => fun(State) ->
  394: 		      server_stop_transport(State)
  395: 	      end}
  396: 
  397:     ].
  398: 
  399: start_and_stop_client_commands(Config, TO, ServerPort, _ServerHost) ->
  400:     Opts = [{port, ServerPort}],
  401:     Self = self(),
  402:     [
  403:      #{id   => 1,
  404:        desc => "Command sequence init",
  405:        cmd  => fun(State) ->
  406: 		       {ok, State#{parent => Self}}
  407: 	       end},
  408: 
  409:      #{id   => 2,
  410:        desc => "Start transport",
  411:        cmd  => fun(State) ->
  412: 		       client_start_transport(State)
  413: 	       end},
  414: 
  415:      #{id   => 3,
  416:        desc => "Open",
  417:        cmd  => fun(State) ->
  418: 		       client_open(Config, State, Opts)
  419: 	       end},
  420: 
  421:      #{id   => 4,
  422:        desc => "Await continue",
  423:        cmd  => fun(State) ->
  424: 		       client_await_continue_signal(State, TO)
  425: 	       end},
  426: 
  427:      #{id   => 5,
  428:        desc => "Await nothing",
  429:        cmd  => fun(State) ->
  430: 		       client_await_nothing(State, 5000)
  431: 	       end},
  432: 
  433:      #{id   => 6,
  434:        desc => "Close",
  435:        cmd  => fun(State) ->
  436: 		       client_close(State)
  437: 	       end},
  438: 
  439:      #{id   => 7,
  440:        desc => "Stop transport",
  441:        cmd  => fun(State) ->
  442: 		       client_stop_transport(State)
  443: 	       end}
  444:     ].
  445: 
  446: 
  447: 
  448: %% =================================================
  449: %%
  450: %% ------------------ sending ------------------------
  451: %% 
  452: %% =================================================
  453: 
  454: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  455: 
  456: sendreceive(suite) ->
  457:     [];
  458: sendreceive(doc) ->
  459:     ["Test send and receive with the UDP transport. "];
  460: sendreceive(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  461:     Factor = ?config(megaco_factor, Config),
  462:     ct:timetrap(Factor * ?SECS(30)),
  463:     Pre = fun() ->
  464: 		  p("create nodes"),
  465: 		  ServerNode = make_node_name(server),
  466: 		  ClientNode = make_node_name(client),
  467: 		  Nodes = [ServerNode, ClientNode],
  468: 		  ok = ?START_NODES(Nodes),
  469: 		  Nodes
  470: 	  end,
  471:     Case = fun(X) -> do_sendreceive(Config, Factor, X) end,
  472:     Post = fun(Nodes) ->
  473:                    p("stop nodes"),
  474:                    ?STOP_NODES(lists:reverse(Nodes))
  475:            end,
  476:     try_tc(sendreceive, Pre, Case, Post).
  477: 
  478: do_sendreceive(Config, Factor, [ServerNode, ClientNode]) ->
  479:     %% Create command sequences
  480:     p("create command sequences"),
  481:     TOCalc = fun(BaseTO) -> to_calc(Factor, BaseTO) end,
  482:     TO     = TOCalc(?SECS(5)),
  483:     ServerPort = 2944,
  484:     ServerCmds = sendreceive_server_commands(Config, TO, ServerPort),
  485:     {ok, ServerHost} = inet:gethostname(),
  486:     ClientCmds = sendreceive_client_commands(Config, TO, ServerPort, ServerHost),
  487: 
  488:     %% Start the test procs used in the test-case, one for each node
  489:     p("start command handlers"),
  490:     Server = server_start_command_handler(ServerNode, ServerCmds),
  491:     p("server command handler started: ~p", [Server]),
  492:     Client = client_start_command_handler(ClientNode, ClientCmds),
  493:     p("client command handler started: ~p", [Client]),
  494: 
  495:     ok =
  496:         receive
  497:             {operational, Server} ->
  498:                 p("received operational message from server [~p] => "
  499:                   "send continue to client [~p]~n", [Server, Client]),
  500:                 Client ! {continue, self()},
  501:                 ok;
  502: 	    {'EXIT', Server, {skip, Reason}} ->
  503: 		?SKIP(Reason);
  504: 	    {'EXIT', Client, {skip, Reason}} ->
  505: 		?SKIP(Reason)        
  506: 	after TO ->
  507:                 {error, server_timeout}
  508:         end,
  509: 
  510:     ok = await_command_handler_completion([Server, Client], TOCalc(?SECS(20))),
  511:     p("done"),
  512:     ok.
  513: 
  514: 
  515: sendreceive_server_commands(Config, TO, Port) ->
  516:     Opts = [{port, Port}], 
  517:     Self = self(),
  518:     [
  519:      #{id   => 1,
  520:        desc => "Command sequence init",
  521:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  522: 		       {ok, State#{parent => Self}} 
  523: 	       end},
  524: 
  525:      #{id   => 2,
  526:        desc => "Start transport",
  527:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  528: 		       server_start_transport(State) 
  529: 	       end},
  530: 
  531:      #{id   => 3,
  532:        desc => "Open",
  533:        cmd  => fun(State) ->
  534: 		       server_open(Config, State, Opts)
  535: 	       end},
  536: 
  537:      #{id   => 4,
  538:        desc => "Notify operational",
  539:        cmd  => fun(State) ->
  540: 		       server_notify_operational(State)
  541: 	       end},
  542: 
  543:      #{id   => 5,
  544:        desc => "Await initial message (ping)",
  545:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  546: 		       server_await_initial_message(State, "ping", TO)
  547: 	       end},
  548: 
  549:      #{id   => 6,
  550:        desc => "Send reply (pong) to initial message",
  551:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  552: 		       server_send_message(State, "pong") 
  553: 	       end},
  554: 
  555:      #{id   => 7,
  556:        desc => "Await nothing before sending a message (hejsan)",
  557:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  558: 		       server_await_nothing(State, TO div 5)
  559: 	       end},
  560: 
  561:      #{id   => 8,
  562:        desc => "Send message (hejsan)",
  563:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  564: 		       server_send_message(State, "hejsan") 
  565: 	       end},
  566: 
  567:      #{id   => 9,
  568:        desc => "Await reply (hoppsan) to message",
  569:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  570: 		       server_await_message(State, "hoppsan", TO div 5) 
  571: 	       end},
  572: 
  573:      #{id   => 10,
  574:        desc => "Await nothing before closing",
  575:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  576: 		       server_await_nothing(State, TO div 5)
  577: 	       end},
  578:      
  579:      #{id   => 11,
  580:        desc => "Close",
  581:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  582: 		       server_close(State) 
  583: 	       end},
  584:      
  585:      #{id   => 12,
  586:        desc => "Await nothing before stopping transport",
  587:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  588: 		       server_await_nothing(State, TO div 5)
  589: 	       end},
  590:      
  591:      #{id   => 13,
  592:        desc => "Stop",
  593:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  594: 		       server_stop_transport(State) 
  595: 	       end}
  596:     ].
  597: 
  598: sendreceive_client_commands(Config, TO, ServerPort, ServerHost) ->
  599:     OwnPort = ServerPort+1, 
  600:     Opts    = [{port, OwnPort}], 
  601:     Self    = self(),
  602:     [
  603:      #{id   => 1,
  604:        desc => "Command sequence init",
  605:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  606: 		       {ok, State#{parent => Self}} 
  607: 	       end},
  608: 
  609:      #{id   => 2,
  610:        desc => "Start transport",
  611:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  612: 		       client_start_transport(State) 
  613: 	       end},
  614: 
  615:      #{id   => 3,
  616:        desc => "Open",
  617:        cmd  => fun(State) ->
  618: 		       client_open(Config, State, Opts)
  619: 	       end},
  620: 
  621:      #{id   => 4,
  622:        desc => "Await continue",
  623:        cmd  => fun(State) ->
  624: 		       client_await_continue_signal(State, TO)
  625: 	       end},
  626: 
  627:      #{id   => 5,
  628:        desc => "Connect",
  629:        cmd  => fun(State) ->
  630: 		       client_connect(State, ServerHost, ServerPort)
  631: 	       end},
  632: 
  633:      #{id   => 6,
  634:        desc => "Send initial message (ping)",
  635:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  636: 		       client_send_message(State, "ping") 
  637: 	       end},
  638: 
  639:      #{id   => 7,
  640:        desc => "Await reply (pong) to initial message",
  641:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  642: 		       client_await_message(State, "pong", TO div 5)
  643: 	       end},
  644: 
  645:      #{id   => 8,
  646:        desc => "Await message (hejsan)",
  647:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  648: 		       client_await_message(State, "hejsan", TO)
  649: 	       end},
  650: 
  651:      #{id   => 9,
  652:        desc => "Send reply (hoppsan) to message",
  653:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  654: 		       client_send_message(State, "hoppsan") 
  655: 	       end},
  656: 
  657:      #{id   => 10,
  658:        desc => "Await nothing before closing",
  659:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  660: 		       client_await_nothing(State, TO div 5)
  661: 	       end},
  662: 
  663:      #{id   => 11,
  664:        desc => "Close",
  665:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  666: 		       client_close(State) 
  667: 	       end},
  668: 
  669:      #{id   => 12,
  670:        desc => "Await nothing before stopping transport",
  671:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  672: 		       client_await_nothing(State, TO div 5)
  673: 	       end},
  674: 
  675:      #{id   => 13,
  676:        desc => "Stop transport",
  677:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  678: 		       client_stop_transport(State) 
  679: 	       end}
  680:     ].
  681: 
  682: 
  683: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  684: 
  685: block_unblock(suite) ->
  686:     [];
  687: block_unblock(doc) ->
  688:     ["Test the block/unblock functions of the UDP transport. "];
  689: block_unblock(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  690:     Factor = ?config(megaco_factor, Config),
  691:     ct:timetrap(Factor * ?MINS(1)),
  692:     Pre = fun() ->
  693: 		  p("create nodes"),
  694: 		  ServerNode = make_node_name(server),
  695: 		  ClientNode = make_node_name(client),
  696: 		  Nodes = [ServerNode, ClientNode],
  697: 		  ok = ?START_NODES(Nodes),
  698: 		  Nodes
  699: 	  end,
  700:     Case = fun(X) -> do_block_unblock(Config, Factor, X) end,
  701:     Post = fun(Nodes) ->
  702:                    p("stop nodes"),
  703:                    ?STOP_NODES(lists:reverse(Nodes))
  704:            end,
  705:     try_tc(block_unblock, Pre, Case, Post).
  706: 
  707: do_block_unblock(Config, Factor, [ServerNode, _ClientNode]) ->
  708:     %% Create command sequences
  709:     p("create command sequences"),
  710:     TOCalc = fun(BaseTO) -> to_calc(Factor, BaseTO) end,
  711:     TO     = TOCalc(?SECS(5)),
  712:     ServerPort = 2944,
  713:     p("generated command sequences with timeout: ~w msec", [TO]),
  714:     ServerCmds = block_unblock_server_commands(Config, TO, ServerPort),
  715:     {ok, ServerHost} = inet:gethostname(),
  716:     ClientCmds = block_unblock_client_commands(Config, TO, ServerPort, ServerHost),
  717: 
  718:     %% Start the test procs used in the test-case, one for each node
  719:     p("start command handlers"),
  720:     Server = server_start_command_handler(ServerNode, ServerCmds),
  721:     p("server command handler started: ~p", [Server]),
  722:     Client = client_start_command_handler(node(), % ClientNode,
  723:                                           ClientCmds),
  724:     p("client command handler started: ~p", [Client]),
  725: 
  726:     %% Wait for the server to become ready for operation
  727:     %% and then tell the client to continue
  728:     ok =
  729:         receive
  730:             {operational, Server} ->
  731:                 p("received operational message from server [~p] => "
  732:                   "send continue to client [~p]~n", [Server, Client]),
  733:                 Client ! {continue, self()},
  734:                 ok;
  735: 	    {'EXIT', Server, {skip, Reason1}} ->
  736: 		?SKIP(Reason1);
  737: 	    {'EXIT', Client, {skip, Reason2}} ->
  738: 		?SKIP(Reason2)
  739:         after TO ->
  740:                 {error, server_timeout}
  741:         end,
  742: 
  743:     %% Wait for the client to become blocked
  744:     %% and then tell the server to continue
  745:     ok = 
  746: 	receive
  747: 	    {blocked, Client} ->
  748: 		p("received blocked message from client [~p] => "
  749: 		  "send continue to server [~p]~n", [Client, Server]),
  750: 		Server ! {continue, self()},
  751: 		ok;
  752: 	    {'EXIT', Server, {skip, Reason3}} ->
  753: 		?SKIP(Reason3);
  754: 	    {'EXIT', Client, {skip, Reason4}} ->
  755: 		?SKIP(Reason4)
  756: 	after TO ->
  757: 		{error, timeout}
  758: 	end,
  759: 
  760:     ok = await_command_handler_completion([Server, Client], TOCalc(?SECS(20))),
  761:     p("done"),
  762:     ok.
  763: 
  764: 
  765: block_unblock_server_commands(Config, TO, Port) ->
  766:     Opts = [{port, Port}], 
  767:     Self = self(),
  768:     [
  769:      #{id   => 1,
  770:        desc => "Command sequence init",
  771:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  772: 		       {ok, State#{parent => Self}} 
  773: 	       end},
  774: 
  775:      #{id   => 2,
  776:        desc => "Start transport",
  777:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  778: 		       server_start_transport(State) 
  779: 	       end},
  780: 
  781:      #{id   => 3,
  782:        desc => "Open",
  783:        cmd  => fun(State) ->
  784: 		       server_open(Config, State, Opts)
  785: 	       end},
  786: 
  787:      #{id   => 4,
  788:        desc => "Notify operational",
  789:        cmd  => fun(State) ->
  790: 		       server_notify_operational(State)
  791: 	       end},
  792: 
  793:      #{id   => 5,
  794:        desc => "Await initial message (ping)",
  795:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  796: 		       server_await_initial_message(State, "ping", TO)
  797: 	       end},
  798: 
  799:      #{id   => 6,
  800:        desc => "Send reply (pong) to initial message",
  801:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  802: 		       server_send_message(State, "pong") 
  803: 	       end},
  804: 
  805:      #{id   => 7,
  806:        desc => "Await continue - and nothing else",
  807:        cmd  => fun(State) ->
  808: 		       server_await_continue_signal(State, TO)
  809: 	       end},
  810: 
  811:      #{id   => 8,
  812:        desc => "Send message (hejsan) (client is blocked)",
  813:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  814: 		       server_send_message(State, "hejsan") 
  815: 	       end},
  816: 
  817:      #{id   => 9,
  818:        desc => "Await reply (hoppsan) to message",
  819:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  820: 		       server_await_message(State, "hoppsan", TO)
  821: 	       end},
  822: 
  823:      #{id   => 10,
  824:        desc => "Await nothing before closing",
  825:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  826: 		       server_await_nothing(State, TO div 5)
  827: 	       end},
  828: 
  829:      #{id   => 11,
  830:        desc => "Close",
  831:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  832: 		       server_close(State) 
  833: 	       end},
  834: 
  835:      #{id   => 12,
  836:        desc => "Await nothing before stopping transport",
  837:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  838: 		       server_await_nothing(State, TO div 5)
  839: 	       end},
  840: 
  841:      #{id   => 13,
  842:        desc => "Stop",
  843:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  844: 		       server_stop_transport(State) 
  845: 	       end}
  846: 
  847:     ].
  848: 
  849: block_unblock_client_commands(Config, TO, ServerPort, ServerHost) ->
  850:     OwnPort = ServerPort+1, 
  851:     Opts    = [{port, OwnPort}], 
  852:     Self    = self(),
  853:     [
  854:      #{id   => 1,
  855:        desc => "Command sequence init",
  856:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  857: 		       {ok, State#{parent => Self}} 
  858: 	       end},
  859: 
  860:      #{id   => 2,
  861:        desc => "Start transport",
  862:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  863: 		       client_start_transport(State) 
  864: 	       end},
  865: 
  866:      #{id   => 3,
  867:        desc => "Open",
  868:        cmd  => fun(State) ->
  869: 		       client_open(Config, State, Opts)
  870: 	       end},
  871: 
  872:      #{id   => 4,
  873:        desc => "Await continue",
  874:        cmd  => fun(State) ->
  875: 		       client_await_continue_signal(State, TO)
  876: 	       end},
  877: 
  878:      #{id   => 5,
  879:        desc => "[pseudo] Connect",
  880:        cmd  => fun(State) ->
  881: 		       client_connect(State, ServerHost, ServerPort)
  882: 	       end},
  883: 
  884:      #{id   => 6,
  885:        desc => "Send initial message (ping)",
  886:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  887: 		       client_send_message(State, "ping") 
  888: 	       end},
  889: 
  890:      #{id   => 7,
  891:        desc => "Await reply (pong) to initial message",
  892:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  893: 		       client_await_message(State, "pong", TO div 5)
  894: 	       end},
  895: 
  896:      #{id   => 8,
  897:        desc => "Socket info before block",
  898:        cmd  => fun(#{socket := Socket} = State) -> 
  899:                        Active =
  900:                            case inet:getopts(Socket, [active]) of
  901:                                {ok, [{active, Act}]} ->
  902:                                    Act;
  903:                                _ ->
  904:                                    undefined
  905:                            end,
  906:                        p("Socket Info: "
  907:                          "~n      Active:      ~p"
  908:                          "~n      Socket Info: ~p",
  909:                          [Active, inet:info(Socket)]),
  910: 		       {ok, State}
  911: 	       end},
  912: 
  913:      #{id   => 9,
  914:        desc => "Block",
  915:        cmd  => fun(#{socket := Socket} = State) ->
  916:                        p("block: enable debug"),
  917:                        ok = enable_socket_debug(Socket),
  918:                        p("block: try block"),
  919: 		       Res = client_block(State),
  920:                        p("block: done:"
  921:                          "~n      ~p", [Res]),
  922:                        Res
  923: 	       end},
  924: 
  925:      #{id   => 10,
  926:        desc => "Ensure blocked",
  927:        cmd  => fun(#{socket := Socket} = State) ->
  928:                        p("ensure blocked: try read active"),
  929:                        case inet:getopts(Socket, [active]) of
  930:                            {ok, [{active, false}]} ->
  931:                                p("Expacted: socket blocked"),
  932:                                {ok, State};
  933:                            {ok, [{active, Active}]} ->
  934:                                p("Unexpected: socket *not* blocked"
  935:                                  "~n   Socket:      ~p"
  936:                                  "~n   Active:      ~p"
  937:                                  "~n   Socket Info: ~p",
  938:                                  [Socket, Active, inet:info(Socket)]),
  939:                                {error, {invalid_active, Active}};
  940:                            {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
  941:                                p("Failed get active: "
  942:                                  "~n   Socket:      ~p"
  943:                                  "~n   Reason:      ~p"
  944:                                  "~n   Socket Info: ~p",
  945:                                  [Socket, Reason, inet:info(Socket)]),
  946:                                ERROR
  947:                        end
  948: 	       end},
  949: 
  950:      #{id   => 11,
  951:        desc => "Notify blocked",
  952:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
  953: 		       client_notify_blocked(State) 
  954: 	       end},
  955: 
  956:      #{id   => 12,
  957:        desc => "Await nothing before unblocking",
  958:        cmd  => fun(#{socket := Socket} = State) -> 
  959:                        Fail =
  960:                            fun(_) ->
  961:                                    Active =
  962:                                        case inet:getopts(Socket, [active]) of
  963:                                            {ok, [{active, Act}]} ->
  964:                                                Act;
  965:                                            _ ->
  966:                                                undefined
  967:                                        end,
  968:                                    p("Socket Info: "
  969:                                      "~n      Active:    ~p"
  970:                                      "~n      Port Info: ~p",
  971:                                      [Active, inet:info(Socket)]),
  972:                                    ok
  973:                            end,
  974: 		       client_await_nothing(State, Fail, TO div 2)
  975: 	       end},
  976: 
  977:      #{id   => 13,
  978:        desc => "Pre-Unblock info",
  979:        cmd  => fun(#{socket := Socket} = State) ->
  980:                        Active =
  981:                            case inet:getopts(Socket, [active]) of
  982:                                {ok, [{active, Act}]} ->
  983:                                    Act;
  984:                                _ ->
  985:                                    undefined
  986:                            end,
  987:                        p("Socket Info: "
  988:                          "~n      Active:    ~p"
  989:                          "~n      Port Info: ~p",
  990:                          [Active, inet:info(Socket)]),
  991: 		       {ok, State}
  992: 	       end},
  993: 
  994:      #{id   => 14,
  995:        desc => "Unblock",
  996:        cmd  => fun(#{socket := Socket} = State) -> 
  997:                        p("unblock: disable debug"),
  998:                        ok = disable_socket_debug(Socket),
  999:                        p("unblock: try unblock"),
 1000: 		       client_unblock(State) 
 1001: 	       end},
 1002: 
 1003:      #{id   => 15,
 1004:        desc => "Post-Unblock info",
 1005:        cmd  => fun(#{socket := Socket} = State) ->
 1006:                        Active =
 1007:                            case inet:getopts(Socket, [active]) of
 1008:                                {ok, [{active, Act}]} ->
 1009:                                    Act;
 1010:                                _ ->
 1011:                                    undefined
 1012:                            end,
 1013:                        p("Socket Info: "
 1014:                          "~n      Active:    ~p"
 1015:                          "~n      Port Info: ~p",
 1016:                          [Active, inet:info(Socket)]),
 1017: 		       {ok, State}
 1018: 	       end},
 1019: 
 1020:      #{id   => 16,
 1021:        desc => "Await message (hejsan)",
 1022:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
 1023: 		       client_await_message(State, "hejsan", TO)
 1024: 	       end},
 1025: 
 1026:      #{id   => 17,
 1027:        desc => "Send reply (hoppsan) to message",
 1028:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
 1029: 		       client_send_message(State, "hoppsan") 
 1030: 	       end},
 1031: 
 1032:      #{id   => 18,
 1033:        desc => "Await nothing before closing",
 1034:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
 1035: 		       client_await_nothing(State, TO)
 1036: 	       end},
 1037: 
 1038:      #{id   => 19,
 1039:        desc => "Close",
 1040:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
 1041: 		       client_close(State) 
 1042: 	       end},
 1043: 
 1044:      #{id   => 20,
 1045:        desc => "Await nothing before stopping transport",
 1046:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
 1047: 		       client_await_nothing(State, TO)
 1048: 	       end},
 1049: 
 1050:      #{id   => 21,
 1051:        desc => "Stop transport",
 1052:        cmd  => fun(State) -> 
 1053: 		       client_stop_transport(State) 
 1054: 	       end}
 1055:     ].
 1056: 
 1057: 
 1058: %% =================================================
 1059: %%
 1060: %% ------------------ errors ------------------------
 1061: %% 
 1062: %% =================================================
 1063: 
 1064: socket_failure(suite) ->
 1065:     [];
 1066: socket_failure(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1067:     ?ACQUIRE_NODES(1, Config),
 1068:     failing_socket().
 1069: 
 1070: 
 1071: %%======================================================================
 1072: %% Test functions
 1073: %%======================================================================
 1074: 
 1075: start_case(Config, Opts, Expect) ->
 1076:     case (catch megaco_udp:start_transport()) of
 1077: 	{ok, Pid} ->
 1078: 	    case (catch ?OPEN(Config, Pid, Opts)) of
 1079: 		{ok, _Handle, _CtrlPid} when Expect =:= ok ->
 1080: 		    {ok, Pid};
 1081: 		{ok, Handle, CtrlPid} ->
 1082: 		    megaco_udp:stop_transport(Pid),
 1083: 		    ?ERROR({unexpected_start_sucesss, Handle, CtrlPid});
 1084: 		{error, _Reason} when Expect =:= error ->
 1085: 		    megaco_udp:stop_transport(Pid),
 1086: 		    ok;
 1087: 		{error, Reason} ->
 1088: 		    megaco_udp:stop_transport(Pid),
 1089: 		    ?ERROR({unexpected_start_failure, Reason});
 1090: 		Error ->
 1091: 		    ?ERROR({unexpected_result, Error})
 1092: 	    end;
 1093: 	{error, Reason} ->
 1094: 	    ?ERROR({failed_starting_transport, Reason})
 1095:     end.
 1096: 
 1097: 
 1098: failing_socket() ->
 1099:     ?SKIP(not_yet_implemented).
 1100: 
 1101: 
 1102: 
 1103: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
 1104: %% Message Callback functions 
 1105: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
 1106: 
 1107: receive_message(ReceiveHandle, ControlPid, SendHandle, BinMsg) 
 1108:   when is_pid(ReceiveHandle) andalso is_binary(BinMsg) ->
 1109:     Msg = binary_to_list(BinMsg), 
 1110:     ReceiveHandle ! {receive_message, {ControlPid, SendHandle, Msg}},
 1111:     ok.
 1112:     
 1113: process_received_message(ReceiveHandle, ControlPid, SendHandle, BinMsg) 
 1114:   when is_pid(ReceiveHandle) andalso is_binary(BinMsg) ->
 1115:     Msg = binary_to_list(BinMsg), 
 1116:     ReceiveHandle ! {process_received_message, {ControlPid, SendHandle, Msg}},
 1117:     ok.
 1118: 
 1119: 
 1120: %%======================================================================
 1121: %% Internal functions
 1122: %%======================================================================
 1123: 
 1124: %% -------  Server command handler and utility functions ----------
 1125: 
 1126: server_start_command_handler(Node, Commands) ->
 1127:     start_command_handler(Node, Commands, #{}, "server").
 1128: 
 1129: server_start_transport(State) when is_map(State) ->
 1130:     case (catch megaco_udp:start_transport()) of
 1131: 	{ok, Ref} ->
 1132:             p("~w -> Transport started: ~p", [?FUNCTION_NAME, Ref]),
 1133: 	    {ok, State#{transport_ref => Ref}};
 1134: 	Error ->
 1135: 	    Error
 1136:     end.
 1137: 
 1138: server_open(Config, #{transport_ref := Ref} = State, Options) 
 1139:   when is_list(Options) ->
 1140:     Opts = [{receive_handle, self()}, {module, ?MODULE} | Options], 
 1141:     try ?OPEN(Config, Ref, Opts) of
 1142: 	{ok, Socket, ControlPid} ->
 1143:             p("~w -> opened: "
 1144:               "~n      Socket:     ~p"
 1145:               "~n      ControlPid: ~p", [?FUNCTION_NAME, Socket, ControlPid]),
 1146: 	    {ok, State#{handle      => {socket, Socket},  % Temporary
 1147: 			control_pid => ControlPid}};
 1148: 	{error, {could_not_open_udp_port, SkipReason}}
 1149:           when (SkipReason =:= eaddrinuse) orelse
 1150:                (SkipReason =:= eacces) ->
 1151: 	    {skip, {server, SkipReason}};
 1152: 	{error, _} = ERROR ->
 1153: 	    ERROR
 1154:     catch
 1155:         C:E:S ->
 1156:             {error, {catched, C, E, S}}
 1157:     end.
 1158: 
 1159: server_notify_operational(#{parent := Parent} = State) ->
 1160:     Parent ! {operational, self()},
 1161:     {ok, State}.
 1162: 
 1163: server_await_continue_signal(#{parent := Parent} = State, Timeout) ->
 1164:     receive
 1165: 	{continue, Parent} ->
 1166:             p("~w -> received expected continue signal", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
 1167: 	    {ok, State};
 1168:         Any ->
 1169:             p("~w -> received UNEXPECTED message: "
 1170:               "~n      ~p", [?FUNCTION_NAME, Any]),
 1171:             {error, {unexpected, Any}}
 1172:     after Timeout ->
 1173: 	    {error, timeout}
 1174:     end.
 1175:     
 1176: server_await_initial_message(State, InitialMessage, Timeout) 
 1177:   when is_map(State) ->
 1178:     receive 
 1179: 	{receive_message, {ControlPid, Handle, InitialMessage}} ->
 1180: 	    p("~w -> received expected event with: "
 1181: 	      "~n      ControlPid: ~p"
 1182: 	      "~n      Handle:     ~p", [?FUNCTION_NAME, ControlPid, Handle]),
 1183: 	    NewState = State#{handle => Handle},
 1184: 	    {ok, NewState};
 1185: 
 1186: 	{receive_message,
 1187:          {OtherControlPid, OtherHandle, OtherInitialMessage}} = OtherMsg ->
 1188: 	    p("~w -> received unexpected message with: "
 1189: 	      "~n      ControlPid: ~p"
 1190: 	      "~n      Handle:     ~p"
 1191: 	      "~n      Expected Initial Message:"
 1192:               "~n         ~p"
 1193: 	      "~n      Actual Initial Message:"
 1194:               "~n         ~p", [?FUNCTION_NAME,
 1195:                                 OtherControlPid,
 1196:                                 OtherHandle,
 1197:                                 InitialMessage, OtherInitialMessage]),
 1198: 	    {error, {unexpected_message, OtherMsg}};
 1199: 
 1200: 	Any ->
 1201: 	    p("~w -> received unexpected event: ~p", [?FUNCTION_NAME, Any]),
 1202: 	    {error, {unexpected_event, Any}}
 1203: 
 1204:     after Timeout ->
 1205: 	    {error, timeout}
 1206:     end.
 1207: 
 1208: server_send_message(#{handle := Handle} = State, Message) ->
 1209:     Bin = if
 1210: 	      is_list(Message) ->
 1211: 		  list_to_binary(Message);
 1212: 	      true ->
 1213: 		  Message
 1214: 	  end,
 1215:     megaco_udp:send_message(Handle, Bin),
 1216:     {ok, State}.
 1217: 
 1218: server_await_nothing(State, Timeout) 
 1219:   when is_map(State) ->
 1220:     receive 
 1221: 	Any ->
 1222: 	    p("~w -> received unexpected event: "
 1223:               "~n      ~p", [?FUNCTION_NAME, Any]),
 1224: 	    {error, {unexpected_event, Any}}
 1225: 
 1226:     after Timeout ->
 1227: 	    {ok, State}
 1228:     end.
 1229: 
 1230: server_await_message(State, ExpectMessage, Timeout) 
 1231:   when is_map(State) ->
 1232:     receive
 1233: 	{receive_message, {_, _, ExpectMessage}} ->
 1234: 	    p("~w -> received expected message [~p]",
 1235:               [?FUNCTION_NAME, ExpectMessage]),
 1236: 	    {ok, State};
 1237: 
 1238: 	Any ->
 1239: 	    p("~w -> received unexpected event: ~p", [?FUNCTION_NAME, Any]),
 1240: 	    {error, {unexpected_event, Any}}
 1241: 
 1242:     after Timeout ->
 1243: 	    {error, timeout}
 1244:     end.
 1245: 
 1246: server_close(#{handle := {socket, Socket}} = State) ->
 1247:     megaco_udp:close(Socket),
 1248:     {ok, State#{handle => undefined, control_pid => undefined}};
 1249: server_close(#{handle := Handle} = State) 
 1250:   when (Handle =/= undefined) ->
 1251:     megaco_udp:close(Handle),
 1252:     {ok, State#{handle => undefined, control_pid => undefined}}.
 1253: 
 1254: server_stop_transport(#{transport_ref := Ref} = State) 
 1255:   when (Ref =/= undefined) ->
 1256:     megaco_udp:stop_transport(Ref),
 1257:     {ok, State#{transport_ref => undefined}}.
 1258: 
 1259: 
 1260: %% -------  Client command handler and utility functions ----------
 1261: 
 1262: client_start_command_handler(Node, Commands) ->
 1263:     start_command_handler(Node, Commands, #{}, "client").
 1264: 		  
 1265: client_start_transport(State) when is_map(State) ->
 1266:     case (catch megaco_udp:start_transport()) of
 1267: 	{ok, Ref} ->
 1268: 	    {ok, State#{transport_ref => Ref}};
 1269: 	Error ->
 1270: 	    Error
 1271:     end.
 1272: 
 1273: client_open(Config, #{transport_ref := Ref} = State, Options) 
 1274:   when is_list(Options) ->
 1275:     Opts = [{receive_handle, self()}, {module, ?MODULE} | Options], 
 1276:     try ?OPEN(Config, Ref, Opts) of
 1277: 	{ok, Socket, ControlPid} ->
 1278: 	    {ok, State#{handle      => {socket, Socket},
 1279:                         socket      => Socket,
 1280: 			control_pid => ControlPid}};
 1281: 	{error, {could_not_open_udp_port, SkipReason}}
 1282:           when (SkipReason =:= eaddrinuse) orelse
 1283:                (SkipReason =:= eacces) ->
 1284: 	    {skip, {client, SkipReason}};
 1285: 	{error, _} = ERROR ->
 1286: 	    ERROR
 1287:     catch
 1288:         C:E:S ->
 1289:             {error, {catched, C, E, S}}
 1290:     end.
 1291: 
 1292: client_await_continue_signal(#{parent := Parent} = State, Timeout) ->
 1293:     receive
 1294: 	{continue, Parent} ->
 1295: 	    {ok, State}
 1296:     after Timeout ->
 1297: 	    {error, timeout}
 1298:     end.
 1299:     
 1300: client_notify_blocked(#{parent := Parent} = State) ->
 1301:     Parent ! {blocked, self()},
 1302:     {ok, State}.
 1303: 
 1304: client_await_nothing(State, Timeout) ->
 1305:     client_await_nothing(State, fun(_) -> ok end, Timeout).
 1306: 
 1307: client_await_nothing(State, Fail, Timeout)
 1308:   when is_map(State) andalso is_function(Fail, 1) ->
 1309:     receive 
 1310: 	Any ->
 1311: 	    p("~w -> received unexpected event: "
 1312:               "~n      ~p", [?FUNCTION_NAME, Any]),
 1313:             (catch Fail(Any)),
 1314: 	    {error, {unexpected_event, Any}}
 1315:     after Timeout ->
 1316: 	    {ok, State}
 1317:     end.
 1318: 
 1319: client_connect(#{handle := {socket, Socket}} = State, Host, Port) ->
 1320:     Handle = megaco_udp:create_send_handle(Socket, Host, Port),
 1321:     {ok, State#{handle => Handle}}.
 1322: 
 1323: client_send_message(#{handle := Handle} = State, Message) ->
 1324:     Bin = if
 1325: 	      is_list(Message) ->
 1326: 		  list_to_binary(Message);
 1327: 	      true ->
 1328: 		  Message
 1329: 	  end,
 1330:     megaco_udp:send_message(Handle, Bin),
 1331:     {ok, State}.
 1332: 
 1333: client_await_message(State, ExpectMessage, Timeout) 
 1334:   when is_map(State) ->
 1335:     receive
 1336: 	{receive_message, {_, _, ExpectMessage}} ->
 1337: 	    {ok, State};
 1338: 
 1339: 	Any ->
 1340: 	    p("~w -> received unexpected event: ~p", [?FUNCTION_NAME, Any]),
 1341: 	    {error, {unexpected_event, Any}}
 1342: 
 1343:     after Timeout ->
 1344: 	    {error, timeout}
 1345:     end.
 1346: 
 1347: client_block(#{handle := Handle} = State) 
 1348:   when (Handle =/= undefined) ->
 1349:     p("~w -> entry with"
 1350:       "~n      Handle: ~p", [?FUNCTION_NAME, Handle]),
 1351:     ok = megaco_udp:block(Handle),
 1352:     {ok, State}.
 1353: 
 1354: client_unblock(#{handle := Handle} = State) 
 1355:   when (Handle =/= undefined) ->
 1356:     p("~w -> entry with"
 1357:       "~n      Handle: ~p", [?FUNCTION_NAME, Handle]),
 1358:     ok = megaco_udp:unblock(Handle),
 1359:     {ok, State}.
 1360: 
 1361: client_close(#{handle := {socket, Socket}} = State) ->
 1362:     megaco_udp:close(Socket),
 1363:     {ok, State#{handle => undefined, control_pid => undefined}};
 1364: client_close(#{handle := Handle} = State) 
 1365:   when (Handle =/= undefined) ->
 1366:     megaco_udp:close(Handle),
 1367:     {ok, State#{handle => undefined, control_pid => undefined}}.
 1368: 
 1369: client_stop_transport(#{transport_ref := Ref} = State) 
 1370:   when (Ref =/= undefined) ->
 1371:     megaco_udp:stop_transport(Ref),
 1372:     {ok, State#{transport_ref => undefined}}.
 1373: 
 1374:     
 1375: %% -------- Command handler interface ---------
 1376: 
 1377: start_command_handler(Node, Commands, State, ShortName) ->
 1378:     ?CH:start(Node, Commands, State, ShortName).
 1379: 
 1380: 
 1381: await_command_handler_completion(Pids, Timeout) ->
 1382:     ?CH:await_completion(Pids, Timeout).
 1383: 
 1384: 
 1385: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1386: 
 1387: try_tc(TCName, Pre, Case, Post) ->
 1388:     try_tc(TCName, "TEST", ?TEST_VERBOSITY, Pre, Case, Post).
 1389: 
 1390: try_tc(TCName, Name, Verbosity, Pre, Case, Post) ->
 1391:     ?TRY_TC(TCName, Name, Verbosity, Pre, Case, Post).
 1392: 
 1393: 
 1394: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1395: 
 1396: %% ------- Misc functions --------
 1397: 
 1398: make_node_name(Name) ->
 1399:     case string:tokens(atom_to_list(node()), [$@]) of
 1400:         [_,Host] ->
 1401:             list_to_atom(lists:concat([atom_to_list(Name) ++ "@" ++ Host]));
 1402:         _ ->
 1403:             exit("Test node must be started with '-sname'")
 1404:     end.
 1405: 
 1406: 
 1407: to_calc(1 = _Factor, BaseTO) when is_integer(BaseTO) andalso (BaseTO > 0) ->
 1408:     BaseTO;
 1409: to_calc(Factor, BaseTO) when is_integer(Factor) andalso (Factor > 0) andalso
 1410:                              is_integer(BaseTO) andalso (BaseTO > 0) ->
 1411:     trunc( ((Factor + 1) / 2) * BaseTO ).
 1412: 
 1413: 
 1414: enable_socket_debug(Socket) ->
 1415:     update_socket_debug(Socket, true).
 1416: 
 1417: disable_socket_debug(Socket) ->
 1418:     update_socket_debug(Socket, false).
 1419: 
 1420: update_socket_debug(Socket, Debug) ->
 1421:     inet:setopts(Socket, [{debug, Debug}]).
 1422: 
 1423: 
 1424: p(F) ->
 1425:     p(F, []).
 1426: 
 1427: p(F, A) ->
 1428:     p(get(sname), F, A).
 1429: 
 1430: p(S, F, A) when is_list(S) ->
 1431:     io:format("*** [~s] ~p ~s ***" 
 1432: 	      "~n   " ++ F ++ "~n", 
 1433: 	      [?FTS(), self(), S | A]);
 1434: p(_S, F, A) ->
 1435:     io:format("*** [~s] ~p *** "
 1436: 	      "~n   " ++ F ++ "~n", 
 1437: 	      [?FTS(), self() | A]).
 1438: 
 1439: 
 1440: %% ms() ->
 1441: %%     erlang:monotonic_time(milli_seconds).
 1442:
